title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description: Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt. The focus is automatically redirected to the library file node in the outline view.
OB: When trying to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus automatically jumps to the library file node.
EB: The expected behavior is that the selected item in the library outline view remains focused and can be selected without being redirected.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Add a label in a library file. 2. Open the library outline view. 3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
